description: A test PRD for integration testing of the Ralph autonomous agent framework

userStories.title: Create hello world function
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a simple hello world function for testing purposes.
acceptanceCriteria: Function is exported from main module
userStories.notes: This is the first test story

userStories.title: Add configuration loading
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to load configuration from a TOML file.
acceptanceCriteria: Default values are applied for missing fields

userStories.title: Implement logging middleware
userStories.description: As a developer, I need logging middleware for debugging.
